attributes.action: compensate and offer surgery for victims of circumcision
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Not necessarily financial. Male circumcision is unwanted, it is
     needless destruction of a helpless babies sexual organ. In
     many, if not all cases, it was performed, without asking, and
     chance in the future to repair the damage that was done, both
     physically and mentally. Indeed, how many of those who had it
     done, would have chosen it, if they were  adults. Parents do
     not have the right to give consent to surgically alter a baby,
     indeed, playing with sex organs is child abuse, so why should
     routine circumcision be different. There have been petitions to
     ban this appalling practise, and not before time. However, what
     about the victims of this abuse? So this petition calls to make
     available surgery for genital reconstruction available to all
     who ask for it.
